wikimediacampaignevents-desc: Provides Wikimedia-specific features for the CampaignEvents extension.
wikimediacampaignevents-grant-id-input-h: If this program or event is supported by a grant from the Wikimedia Foundation, please provide your Grant ID, which you can find in the [https://wmf.fluxx.io/ Grantee Portal (Fluxx)]. Please enter the numbers and dashes in your grant ID, but exclude the letters. For example, if your grant ID is G-1111-1111, please enter 1111-1111.
